description.value:
Activate 2 Interact

Stupor poison is a more potent distillation of lethargy poison. Further exposure to stupor poison doesn't require the target to attempt additional saving throws; only failing a saving throw against an ongoing exposure can progress its stage.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

Maximum Duration 6 hours

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] (1 round)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 2} and off-guard (1 round)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] with no Perception check to wake up (1 round)

Stage 4 unconscious with no Perception check to wake up (1d6 hours)
